prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a strong build and vibrant blue and orange colors.
I want a Pokemon that can thrive in both land and water, showcasing amphibious traits.
Generate a powerful aquatic creature resembling a mix between a frog and a fish.
Make a Pokemon design with a broad, sturdy frame and striking orange fins.
Imagine a Pokemon that exudes strength and agility, perfect for battling in water.
Design a Pokemon with a unique combination of blue body and orange accents.
Give me a water/ground-type Pokemon that has a robust appearance and dynamic features.
